verses.verse: וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַתְּכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> And of the blue וְהָֽאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> they made בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> cloths שְׂרָ֖ד <S%H8278><s%> of service לְשָׁרֵ֣ת <S%H8334><s%> to do service בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> [place] and made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֤י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> for Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses פ

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> the ephod זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined

וַֽיְרַקְּע֞וּ <S%H7554><s%> And they did beat אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> into פַּחֵ֣י <S%H6341><s%> thin plates הַזָּהָב֮ <S%H2091><s%> the gold וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <S%H7112><s%> and cut פְּתִילִם֒ <S%H6616><s%> [it into] wires לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to be woven בְּת֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope הַתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> [it] in the blue וּבְת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <S%H713><s%> and in the purple וּבְת֛וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope תּוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and the scarlet וּבְת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope הַשֵּׁ֑שׁ <S%H8336><s%> and in the fine linen מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H2803><s%> [with] cunning

כְּתֵפֹ֥ת <S%H3802><s%> shoulderpieces עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> They made ל֖וֹ חֹבְרֹ֑ת <S%H2266><s%> for it to couple [it] together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> by the two [קִצְוֹותֹו כ] (קְצֹותָ֖יו <S%H7118><s%> end ק) חֻבָּֽר׃ <S%H2266><s%> was it coupled together

וְחֵ֨שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּת֜וֹ <S%H642><s%> of his ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> of מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> the same הוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> its כְּמַעֲשֵׂהוּ֒ <S%H4639><s%> that [was] upon it [was] of the same according to the work זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> thereof [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And they wrought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stones הַשֹּׁ֔הַם <S%H7718><s%> onyx מֻֽסַבֹּ֖ת <S%H4142><s%> inclosed מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <S%H4865><s%> in ouches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold מְפֻתָּחֹת֙ <S%H6605><s%> graven פִּתּוּחֵ֣י <S%H6605><s%> were engraved חוֹתָ֔ם <S%H2368><s%> as signets עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according שְׁמ֖וֹת <S%H8034><s%> with the names בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on כִּתְפֹ֣ת <S%H3802><s%> them on the shoulders הָאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod אַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> [that they should be] stones זִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> for a memorial לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses פ

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> the breastplate מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> [of] cunning כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> like the work אֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined

רָב֧וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> It was foursquare הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּפ֖וּל <S%H3717><s%> double עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> they made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> the breastplate זֶ֧רֶת <S%H2239><s%> a span אָרְכּ֛וֹ <S%H753><s%> [was] the length וְזֶ֥רֶת <S%H2239><s%> thereof and a span רָחְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth כָּפֽוּל׃ <S%H3717><s%> thereof [being] doubled

וַיְמַלְאוּ־ <S%H4390><s%> And they set ב֔וֹ אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> in it four ט֣וּרֵי <S%H2905><s%> rows אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stones ט֗וּר <S%H2905><s%> [the first] row אֹ֤דֶם <S%H124><s%> [was] a sardius פִּטְדָה֙ <S%H6357><s%> a topaz וּבָרֶ֔קֶת <S%H1304><s%> and a carbuncle הַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> this [was] the first
וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> And the second נֹ֥פֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> an emerald סַפִּ֖יר <S%H5601><s%> a sapphire וְיָהֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H3095><s%> and a diamond
וְהַטּ֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> row הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> And the third לֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H3958><s%> a ligure שְׁב֖וֹ <S%H7618><s%> an agate וְאַחְלָֽמָה׃ <S%H306><s%> and an amethyst

וְהַטּוּר֙ <S%H2905><s%> row הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> And the fourth תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> a beryl שֹׁ֖הַם <S%H7718><s%> an onyx וְיָשְׁפֵ֑ה <S%H3471><s%> and a jasper מֽוּסַבֹּ֛ת <S%H4142><s%> [they were] inclosed מִשְׁבְּצ֥וֹת <S%H4865><s%> in ouches זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold בְּמִלֻּאֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4396><s%> in their inclosings

וְ֠הָאֲבָנִים <S%H68><s%> And the stones עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were corresponding שְׁמֹ֨ת <S%H8034><s%> [were] according to the names בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֛נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> corresponding שְׁמֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> according to their names פִּתּוּחֵ֤י <S%H6603><s%> [like] the engravings חֹתָם֙ <S%H2368><s%> of a signet אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were corresponding שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> with his name לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten שָֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribes

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they made עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֹ֛שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> upon the breastplate שַׁרְשְׁרֹ֥ת <S%H8333><s%> chains גַּבְלֻ֖ת <S%H1383><s%> at the ends מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work עֲבֹ֑ת <S%H5688><s%> [of] wreathen זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> [of] pure

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> two מִשְׁבְּצֹ֣ת <S%H4865><s%> ouches זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [of] gold וּשְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> and two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> in the two קְצ֥וֹת <S%H7098><s%> ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> of the breastplate

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they put שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two הָעֲבֹתֹ֣ת <S%H5688><s%> wreathen chains הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in שְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> in the two הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <S%H2885><s%> rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at קְצ֖וֹת <S%H7098><s%> on the ends הַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> of the breastplate

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> And the two קְצוֹת֙ <S%H7098><s%> ends שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> of the two הָֽעֲבֹתֹ֔ת <S%H5688><s%> wreathen נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they fastened עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> in the two הַֽמִּשְׁבְּצֹ֑ת <S%H4865><s%> ouches וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֛ם <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּתְפֹ֥ת <S%H3802><s%> them on the shoulderpieces הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> it פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they made שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וַיָּשִׂ֕ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> [them] on the two קְצ֣וֹת <S%H7098><s%> ends הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> of the breastplate עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפָת֕וֹ <S%H8193><s%> upon the border אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> of it which [was] on the side הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod בָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> inward

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֮ <S%H6213><s%> And they made שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings זָהָב֒ <S%H2091><s%> [other] golden וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֡ם <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of שְׁתֵּי֩ <S%H8147><s%> them on the two כִתְפֹ֨ת <S%H3802><s%> sides הָאֵפֹ֤ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod מִלְמַ֙טָּה֙ <S%H4295><s%> underneath מִמּ֣וּל <S%H4136><s%> toward פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> the forepart לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> of it over against מֶחְבַּרְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4225><s%> the [other] coupling מִמַּ֕עַל <S%H4605><s%> thereof above לְחֵ֖שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <S%H646><s%> of the ephod

וַיִּרְכְּס֣וּ <S%H7405><s%> And they did bind אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹ֡שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> the breastplate מִטַּבְּעֹתָיו֩ <S%H2885><s%> by his rings אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to טַבְּעֹ֨ת <S%H2885><s%> unto the rings הָאֵפֹ֜ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod בִּפְתִ֣יל <S%H6616><s%> with a lace תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue לִֽהְיֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above חֵ֣שֶׁב <S%H2805><s%> that it might be above the curious girdle הָאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִזַּ֣ח <S%H2118><s%> might not be loosed הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> and that the breastplate מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> from the ephod כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> the robe הָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work אֹרֵ֑ג <S%H707><s%> [of] woven כְּלִ֖יל <S%H3632><s%> all תְּכֵֽלֶת׃ <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue

וּפִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> And [there was] an hole הַמְּעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> of the robe בְּתוֹכ֖וֹ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst כְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> as the hole תַחְרָ֑א <S%H8473><s%> of an habergeon שָׂפָ֥ה <S%H8193><s%> [with] a band לְפִ֛יו <S%H6310><s%> the hole סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִקָּרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7167><s%> that it should not rend

וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And they made עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שׁוּלֵ֣י <S%H7757><s%> upon the hems הַמְּעִ֔יל <S%H4598><s%> of the robe רִמּוֹנֵ֕י <S%H7416><s%> pomegranates תְּכֵ֥לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֖ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֑י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> [and] twined
